ingredients: 2 bell peppers -whatever colours you have on hand
1 package Mrs. Dash -Salt Free Taco Seasoning
1 tbsp adobo sauce -from your can of chipotle peppers
1 tbsp adobo sauce -from your can of chipotle peppers
4 cups cooked turkey -leftover from another meal (or chicken)
2 cups old cheddar cheese -reserve one cup for garnish
1/2 cup greek yogurt -or sour cream (for garnish)
